text: Morgan Williams (born 30 August 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays for Coventry City, as a defender. ==Career== After playing in non- league with Mickleover Sports, Williams signed for Coventry City in July 2018. He made his senior debut on 12 September 2018 in a 3-0 defeat against Arsenal U21 in the EFL Trophy, coming on as a substitute in the 61st minute for Dujon Sterling.
